public class ListViewHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Makes it easier to work with the list view code

Constructor Detail

ListViewHelper

public ListViewHelper(RequestContext requestContext,
                      java.lang.String filterField)
Initializes the helper. A new helper instance should be created for each request. Caching helpers is strongly discouraged.

Parameters:
requestContext - current request
filterField - name of the DTO/Map field which will be filtered For example, if the DTO has a getLabel method, then the field name would be label.

Parameters:

Indicate if the data result can be filtered

Parameters:
flag - on/off toggle

Gets the filter parameter specified by the user

Gets the filter parameter specified by the user on the immediately prior request

prepare

public void prepare()
Sets up the environment for list view processing This should be called immediately before rendering the page containing the list view

prepare

public void prepare(java.lang.String displayName)
Sets up the environment for list view processing This should be called immediately before rendering the page containing the list view

Parameters:
displayName - the name to store the list view's data under
